channel.title: N8n on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in N8n on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Automating Workflows with n8n
item.description: Explore how to set up and run n8n, a powerful open-source workflow automation tool, on a local Windows machine using Docker and WSL. This post walks through initial configuration, running demo workflows, and learning key n8n concepts through hands-on examples.
